chunk:
Danielle Creations Hydrating Cleansing Cloths (2018 formulation)

Brand: Danielle

Category: Makeup Remover

Ingredients: WATER, PEG-6 CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC GLYCERIDES, GLYCERIN, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, PHENOXYETHANOL, CETEARYL ISONONANOATE, GLYCERYL STEARATE, CETYL PALMITATE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, CETEARETH-20, CETEARETH-12, CITRIC ACID, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUI

BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE, SODIUM BENZOATE, PEG-40 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, BENZOIC ACID, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE (VIT. E), DEHYDROACETIC ACID

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
